description: This is your go-to place to discover who you really are, where you have come from and where you are going. The greatest blend of all philosophies, religions and spirituality, you will get tasty food, music, talks, and books to whet your appetite for your journey back to the spiritual world. Whether you want a peaceful haven to chill out or someone to speak to you will find it here in Soho Street.
facilities: Handrails on one side of stairs

factsheet.heading: How the temple came to be here
paragraphs: You will be asked to take your shoes off before you go into the temple room. There will be a music ceremony at 12.30pm, where you will be able to view Sri Sri Radha Londonisvara, Lord Jagannatha, Baladeva and Subhadra Devi and pray to Them for anything you want, followed by a talk on the building at 1.00pm and you will then be offered a plate of prasadam (sanctified foodstuffs) at 1.50pm. Everyone is asked to sit on the floor on cushions, but some chairs can be provided.

location.address: 10, Soho Street, off Oxford Street, near Tottenham Court Road Station
travel_info: Tube: Oxford Circus, Tottenham Court Road

name: Hare Krishna Temple in London
